code: import axiosClient from'./axiosClient';var ChatRoomsAPI={getMessageByRoomId:function getMessageByRoomId(roomId){var url="/chatrooms/getById?roomId=".concat(roomId);return axiosClient.get(url);},createNewRoom:function createNewRoom(){var url="/chatrooms/createNewRoom";return axiosClient.post(url);},addMessage:function addMessage(query){var url="/chatrooms/counselor/addMessage".concat(query);return axiosClient.put(url);},searchMessage:function searchMessage(query){var url="/chatrooms/counselor/searchMessage".concat(query);return axiosClient.post(url);},getAllRoom:function getAllRoom(query){var url="/chatrooms/counselor/getAllRoom".concat(query);return axiosClient.get(url);}};export default ChatRoomsAPI;
